name: Maria Snyder Consulting
overview:
Social media management, social media maintenance, social media resources and social media consulting for your small business and individual needs.

I am a Certified Public Accountant with specialty skills to help your business succeed using social media.

Small Business Services and Social Media Consulting

  • I can help your business get started marketing it’s services online using Social Media sites such as: Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, and more. See my Packages and Pricing page for details.

  • The Facebook Fan page is one popular way to promote your business. Customization of custom tabs where your product or business product is featured is possible. Option settings, blog integration and click-able links to your Twitter account and Linked In profiles are important.

  • Google places™ business listing is a powerful way to get your business noticed. Consumers search for business often by performing a Google search. Establishing a Google places™ business listing is your in to the road of being found. Google places is your mini site on the web for a less intrusive presence on the web. Posts, live updates and responses to reviews are options using Google places.

  • I can easily show you the tools you need to manage these sites in a short amount of time each day to increase your business traffic & sales with my easy to understand consulting style. See my Packages and Pricing page for details.
